name: Cor In Machina
description:
A quick action-rich railshooter with upgrade mechanics. Can you fly behind enemy lines and save the galaxy?

Average Playtime: 10-25 Minutes

Best played with a gamepad (but keyboard is possible). There is a list of the controls in the game itself.

If the game generates enough interest I'll probably develop a full-length version of it (~1-2h). When that is something you want to see happen, rate and comment to let me know!
